intent_atoms.description: Integrate MP4RA-backed BoxCatalog into ParsePipeline.live() so streaming events include metadata for known boxes and log unknown identifiers once per run.
MP4RA Boxes are correctly decoded from bundled JSON fixture and cross-platform diagnostics support is available.
ParsePipeline live tests expanded to cover standard and UUID-based lookups of BoxCatalog.
Unknown identifiers are logged only once per run.
Bundled MP4RA JSON fixture and decoding infrastructure added with cross-platform diagnostics support.
Automate refreshing MP4RABoxes.json from upstream registry and document maintenance workflow via R1.

functional_units.name: MP4RA BoxCatalog Integration
functional_units.description: Integrates the MP4RA-backed BoxCatalog into ParsePipeline.live() to provide metadata for known boxes and logs unknown identifiers once per run.

functional_units.name: Bundled MP4RA JSON Fixture & Decoding Infrastructure
functional_units.description: Provides bundled MP4RA JSON fixture and decoding infrastructure with cross-platform diagnostics support.

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline Live Tests
functional_units.description: Expanded tests for ParsePipeline live functionality, including catalog lookups for standard and UUID-based boxes.

functional_units.name: Catalog Lookup Tests
functional_units.description: Dedicated tests covering standard and UUID-based lookups in the BoxCatalog.

functional_units.name: MP4RA Catalog Refresh Automation
functional_units.description: Automates refreshing MP4RABoxes.json from the upstream registry and documents maintenance workflow.
